channel.title: Who can I recognize 1-hop onion services?
channel.description: Since the display in the Tor Browser is disabled in flavor of the isolated proxy setup, I wanted to know how I could recognize a "normal" and a 1-hop onion service.

item.title: Who can I recognize 1-hop onion services?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Until / If we can make circuit display work this is unsupported.

Whonix – 19 Jun 20

Undocumented / Untested / Unsupported
